item.title: You Won't Believe What Happened When We Cooked This 2 1/2 Pound Pulled Pork Boston Butt!
item.description: IV. Conclusion Introduction If you’re a fan of pulled pork, you’ll love what we did with this 2 1/2 pound Boston Butt! We cooked it to perfection and the results were amazing. In this blog post, we’ll take you through the process of preparing, cooking, and enjoying this delicious pulled pork. Overview of the Boston Butt The Boston Butt is a cut of pork that comes from the shoulder of the pig.
